component.name: Visual Studio Code (Insiders)
component.summary: Visual Studio Code. Code editing. Redefined.

description.p: Visual Studio Code is a new choice of tool that combines the simplicity of a code editor with what developers need for the core edit-build-debug cycle.

This is the Insiders edition of Visual Studio Code; an experimental beta release containing new features and updates not yet ready for the stable release stream. If you are experiencing issues with this version, please switch back to the non-Insiders build.
This is the proprietary Microsoft build of Visual Studio Code Insiders, packaged into a Flatpak. This repackaging is not supported by Microsoft.

screenshot.caption: Editing TypeScript and searching for extensions
